snippet.title: OveRRooT_Trailer_0
snippet.description:
Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2557480/OveRRooT/

OveRRooT is an Action Side Scroller, with Trail and Error mechanics, focused on challenging and fast paced combat.

You control Root, A sophisticated malware created with a sole objective: bypass the defenses of malfunctioning computer systems by erasing their cyberspace, in order to reset them to their default state and bring them back to life again.

Now it's time for you to take on a new job, in a new system. Nothing more than just the same old routine... probably.

Developed by Hexagony.
